title.narrative: Greater Mekong Subregion Corridor Towns Development Project

description.narrative: The project will enhance the competitiveness of towns along the East-West Economic Corridor (EWEC) and the Southern Economic Corridor (SEC) and support the development of the GMS transport corridors into vibrant economic corridors. The project will transform the corridor towns of Dong Ha, Lao Bao, and Moc Bai into economic hubs by improving urban environmental infrastructure and strengthening institutional capacities of provincial and local authorities. Increased climate resilience through flood control measures will significantly improve the productivity of economic enterprises in these towns. Clean wastewater, solid-waste disposal, and enhanced mobility on improved urban roads will improve the environment. The project will provide environmental infrastructure, of which wastewater treatment and solid-waste management specifically will help to reduce the carbon footprint of these towns, making them cleaner, greener, and more livable. The project finances 10 subprojects in the three towns.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Urban infrastructure and services are adequate and operate efficiently in Dong Ha City, Lao Bao, and Moc Bai

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
More than 62 km of urban roads providing ease of access and mobility to more than 200,000 local residents

description.narrative: Urban infrastructure and services are adequate and operate efficiently in Dong Ha City, Lao Bao, and Moc Bai

title.narrative: Lao Bao: Solid waste collection increased from 14 tons/day (2012) to 32 tons/day. Industrial waste, from 5 tons (2012) to 11 tons/day

description.narrative: Urban infrastructure and services are adequate and operate efficiently in Dong Ha City, Lao Bao, and Moc Bai

title.narrative: Moc Bai: 22,000 households provided adequate water supply (2011: 18,000 households)

description.narrative: Urban infrastructure and services are adequate and operate efficiently in Dong Ha City, Lao Bao, and Moc Bai

title.narrative: Lao Bao: Households serviced by solid waste collection increased to 90% (2011: 59%)

description.narrative: Urban infrastructure and services are adequate and operate efficiently in Dong Ha City, Lao Bao, and Moc Bai

title.narrative: Dong Ha: 700 hectares of prime land and 15,000 households experience reduced annual flood events

description.narrative: Urban infrastructure and services are adequate and operate efficiently in Dong Ha City, Lao Bao, and Moc Bai
